text:
Hi <@U07MY6QFH6K>

It sounds like you’ve already taken some steps in the right direction, but here are a few things to double-check:

1. *DNS Configuration*: Ensure that your subdomain is correctly set up in SquareSpace and that the MX records are properly configured to point to Google Workspace.
2. *Google Workspace*: Make sure you’ve added the subdomain as an alias and created the email addresses you need.
3. *HubSpot Integration*: After confirming your MX records, try re-adding the email address in HubSpot. Sometimes it helps to give it a little time for the DNS changes to propagate.
Feel free to ping me if you need to discuss further. I will be happy to help
Thank you! I was able to validate my SPF for regular email sending, but setting up a subdomain for transactional is still giving me an issue. It's saying
<@U07MY6QFH6K> Okay! Let me check if I can find something to fix this for you.
